entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
